subject: QiSkit Fall Fest Test
body: You are recieving this email because you have signed up for the QiSkit fall fest.
<ul><li>The QiSkit Fall Fest is starting this Friday (November 7th)!
This is happening in the Rutherford Physics Building on McGill campus, in the Bell room (Room 105).
• Join our Discord for updates and future resources!
All the communication for this event and future events will occur through this server.
To participate in this event, show the QR code attached below to the event organizers upon arrival.
We will be at the foyer of the building, so you should be able to find us!
Thanks again for showing interest in the QiSkit Fall Fest! We hope to see you on Friday!
